1443.question: Do the tweets come from a specific region?

3-Table2-1.png: Yes, the tweets come from various countries.</s>
Yes, the tweets come from various regions including India, USA, United Kingdom, France, Australia, South Africa, Japan, Kenya, UAE, New Zealand, Iran, Canada, Sweden, Spain, Austria, and Russia.</s>
3-Figure1-1.png: Yes, the tweets come predominantly from North America and Europe.</s>
Yes, the tweets come from various regions around the world, as indicated by the different colors on the map.</s>
